summary: 10 Mods to make Skyrim more colorful and green.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00]DESCRIPTION-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]

10 Mods to make Skyrim more colorful and green. Overall better looks.

Some mods are [u][color=#ff0000]not fully compatible[/color][/u], but if you [u][color=#ff0000]install the Mods in the following order (1-10)[/color][/u] and overwrite content everytime, there will be [color=#ff0000][u]no problem.[/u][/color]
You will get the look from the pictures. Just click on the Links.
If you want to keep the trees from Tamriel Reloaded HD: delete nothing and skip step [color=#00ff00]3[/color].

[color=#ffff00]REQUIREMENTS--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]

Skyrim latest Update
Dawnguard
Dragonborn
Hearthfires

SKSE only if you use ENB.

[color=#ffff00]LIST---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]

[color=#00ff00]1[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/?]Static Mesh Improvement Mod[/url]
[color=#00ff00][color=#00ff00]2[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61995/?]Tamriel Reloaded HD[/url] [/color]Replace: yes (then delete all "trees"-folders in Meshes and Textures and grandoak12.dds before step [color=#00ff00]3[/color])
[color=#00ff00]3[/color][color=#00ff00] [/color][color=#0000ff][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]Skyrim Flora Overhaul: Summer Edition[/url] [/color]Replace: yes (add [i]iMaxGrassTypesPerTexure=15[/i] below [i][Grass][/i] in your Skyrim.ini)
[color=#00ff00]4 [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38004/?]Vivid Landscapes: Rocking Stones[/url] Replace: yes
[color=#00ff00][color=#00ff00][color=#00ff00]5[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1111/?]Pure Waters[/url]
6[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19446/?]The Skyrim Distance Overhaul[/url][/color]
[color=#00ff00]7[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30450/?]Realistic lighting Overhaul[/url]
[color=#00ff00]8 [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50753/?]Surreal Lighting
[/url][color=#00ff00]9[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?]Climates Of Tamriel
[/url]
[color=#00ff00](10)[/color] If your PC is powerful enough you can also install [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?]RealvisionENB[/url] or any ENB with Fantasy Style Setting

[color=#ffff00]VIDEOS------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[/color]

author: Katoari
